named-query.name: BlfTaskStatusType.findByBailiffTaskStatusTypeCode
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM BlfTaskStatusType t WHERE t.effvStartDate<= :effvStartDate AND t.effvEndDate>= :effvEndDate AND t.activeFlag = :activeFlag AND t.blfTaskStatusTypeCd = :blfTaskStatusTypeCd ORDER BY t.blfTaskStatusTypeId
